Ingredients.4: 4 (1/2 inch) slices chopped stemmed chard (about 2 bunches)

Ingredients.6: 0.5 cup sliced roasted red bell peppers in water, drained

Directions.1: Process Country Crock® Spread, basil and garlic in food processor or blender until almost smooth.

Directions.2: Spread 2 slices bread with basil butter. Top with spinach, roasted pepper, mozzarella, and remaining bread slices.

Directions.3: To cook in panini press: Preheat the press. Add sandwich and cook according to the manufacturer's instructions until golden and crisp, 3 to 5 minutes. Repeat with remaining sandwich.

Directions.4: To cook in skillet: Melt 1 tablespoon Country Crock® Spread over medium heat in skillet and add sandwiches to skillet. Place a heatproof plate on top of sandwiches and weigh down with heavy heat-proof object. Cook sandwiches 3 to 4 minutes or until golden. Turn sandwiches over and weigh down with plate. Cook 3 minutes or until golden and cheese is melted.
